title: ISketchRelationManager.IAddRelation
description: Adds a relation to the specified entities in the active sketch.
signature:
SketchRelation IAddRelation( 
   System.Int32
NumEntities
,
   ref System.Object
EntityArray
,
   System.Int32
RelationType
)

parameters.name: NumEntities
parameters.description: Number of entities to which to add the relation

parameters.name: EntityArray
parameters.description: Array of entities to which to add the relation

parameters.name: RelationType
parameters.description: Type of relation as defined by swConstraintType_e

remarks:
A sketch must be active for this method to have any effect. Use
IModelDoc2::GetActiveSketch2
or
IModelDoc2::IGetActiveSketch2
to determine if a sketch is active.
Call
ISketchRelationManager::GetRelationsCount
before calling this method to get the value for NumEntities.
